### Environment Variables Needed

Please indicate which environment variables need to be configured in Vercel:

- [ ] `VERCEL_TOKEN` - Vercel API token
- [ ] `OPENAI_API_KEY` - OpenAI API for AI features
- [ ] `REWARDS_PRIVATE_KEY` - Blockchain rewards (testnet)
- [ ] `ALCHEMY_MUMBAI_URL` - Alchemy Mumbai endpoint
- [ ] `REWARDS_API_KEY` - Rewards system API key
- [ ] `REWARDS_CONTRACT_ADDRESS` - Smart contract address
- [ ] `GITHUB_PAT` - GitHub Personal Access Token
- [ ] `PILOT_TEST_WALLET` - Test wallet address
- [ ] Other: ______________________

### ðŸ“‹ Deployment Checklist (for maintainers)

- [ ] Vercel project created and linked to repository
- [ ] Environment variables configured in Vercel dashboard
- [ ] Build settings verified (Framework: Other, Build Command: empty, Output Directory: ./)
- [ ] GitHub integration enabled
- [ ] Auto-deployment configured for target branch
- [ ] Custom domain configured (if applicable)
- [ ] SSL certificate verified
- [ ] Performance headers configured
- [ ] Security headers enabled
- [ ] Test deployment completed successfully
- [ ] Production deployment verified

**Note:** Never share actual secrets or API keys in this issue. Configuration should be done through Vercel dashboard or GitHub Secrets.
